original_text: My parents should have buried me, like a child that is born dead. I would never have seen the light of day. My parents should have buried me,
korean_text: 또는 낙태되어 땅에 묻힌 아이처럼 나는 존재하지 않았겠고 빛을 보지 못한 아이들 같았을 것이라

sentences.original_text: My parents should have buried me
like a child that is born dead
I would never have seen the light of day
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 낮의 빛을 결코 보지 못했을 것이다

sentences.original_text: My parents should have buried me
